events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department and is being forwarded to the recruitment team.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile and will be in touch soon to discuss the next steps in the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview has been completed successfully, and we are impressed with your software development experience.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview scheduled later this week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 2 PM UTC to assess your software engineering skills.
You have completed the technical interview with positive feedback regarding your coding and problem-solving abilities.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th to discuss cultural fit and company values in more detail.
The HR interview went well and we appreciate your enthusiasm and alignment with our company culture.
We are delighted to extend you an offer for the Software Engineer position, including competitive compensation and benefits.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer; we look forward to your official acceptance.
You have formally accepted the offer and we are excited to have you join our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun with orientation sessions and access to development tools.
The hiring process is now officially closed and we welcome you as a new member of our software engineering team.
